statements: DELETE FROM violations WHERE violation_description LIKE '%non-compliance%';
DELETE FROM violations WHERE violation_date = '2022-03-15' AND ai_system_id = 1;
DELETE FROM ai_systems WHERE system_name = 'AI System X' OR compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
DELETE FROM System_Compliance WHERE system_id = 1 AND regulation_id = 101 AND standard_id = 201;
DELETE FROM System_Compliance WHERE system_id = 1 AND regulation_id = 2 AND standard_id = 3;
DELETE FROM system_standards WHERE system_id = 3 AND standard_id = 4;
